```{r setup, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, error=TRUE)
devtools::install_github("sdam-au/sdam")

library(sdam)
library(jsonlite)
library(getPass)
library(tibble)
```

# Loading data

## 1. Input your credentials to Sciencedata
```{r, echo = TRUE }
mycred <- c("648560@au.dk", "Iamnotgivingyoumypassword")
```

## 2. Make the request 
```{r, echo = TRUE }
resp = request("EDH_sample.json", path="/sharingin/648597@au.dk/SDAM_root/SDAM_data/EDH/", method="GET", cred=mycred)
```

##v3. Make a list from the request and display the first six records (head)
```{r}
EDH <- tibble::as_tibble(jsonlite::fromJSON(resp))
head(EDH)
```
# Outcome
Not ideal, the report is knitted, but the password is stored in the document and can be committed to GitHub.
